commandList:
List of IM commands used in the PARAM.in file
#LIMITER F UseMcLimiter 2 BetaLimiter
Set whether or not the MC limiter is used. If it is not, the super bee limiter is used. Also set the Beta parameter for the MC limiter. The default value is shown.
#TIMESIMULATION 0.0 TimeSimulation
This command specifies the simulation time.
#SAVEPLOT 2 DtSavePlot F DoSaveFlux
Define frequency of plots. When DoSaveFlux is false, only integrated values such as species pressure density etc is saved. When DoSaveFlux is true, then another file containing information needed to make plots of species flux in each energy bin is saved.
#RESTART F IsRestart
Determine whether or not to continue a previous run.
#INITIALF2 T IsEmptyInitial
Determines whether to fill the fluxes in the simulation domain based on a Maxwellian determined from MHD quantities (IsEmptyInitial=F) or to set the initial fluxes in the simulation domain to zero (IsEmptyInitial=T). The default is shown.
#END
The #END command signals the end of the included file or the end of the PARAM.in file. Lines following the #END command are ignored. It is not required to use the #END command. The end of the included file or PARAM.in file is equivalent with an #END command in the last line.
